content: I use a DSLR, and I'm looking for something functional and comfortable for long periods of use. I'd prefer a strap with adjustable length and a padded shoulder pad. By the way, I just organized my photography bag last weekend and realized I've been meaning to get a new strap for months now - I got my new 70-200mm lens on February 10th and it's been a game-changer for my photography.
